sentences.en: ‘May I choose the restaurant?’‘Be my guest!’.
sentences.cn: “我可以选餐厅吗？”“请便！”。

sentences.en: a banquet for 250 distinguished guests
sentences.cn: 250位贵宾出席的宴会

sentences.en: A few guest houses had "No Vacancies" notices in their windows.
sentences.cn: 有几家旅社在窗户上贴出了“客满”的告示。

sentences.en: Among the invited guests were Jerry Brown and Elihu Harris.
sentences.cn: 受邀的嘉宾中有杰里·布朗和伊莱休·哈里斯。

sentences.en: Bruce Wyatt will be the guest speaker at next month's meeting.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·怀亚特将成为下月会议的特邀发言人。

sentences.en: Forward of the main cabin are the guest cabins.
sentences.cn: 主舱前面是客舱。

sentences.en: Guests should vacate their rooms by 10.30 a.m.
sentences.cn: 旅客应在上午10:30以前腾出房间。

sentences.en: I was the only hotel guest.
sentences.cn: 我是宾馆里唯一的住客。

sentences.en: I’ve nearly finished the guest list for the wedding.
sentences.cn: 参加婚礼的嘉宾名单我差不多准备好了。

sentences.en: If anybody wants to work on this, be my guest.
sentences.cn: 如果哪位想干这个，请便。

sentences.en: May we suggest you try one of our guest houses.
sentences.cn: 可否请您体验一下我们的客房？

sentences.en: more than 100 wedding guests
sentences.cn: 100多位出席婚礼的宾客

sentences.en: My guest arrived punctually.
sentences.cn: 我的客人来得很准时。

sentences.en: My special guest will be comedian Ben Elton.
sentences.cn: 我的特邀嘉宾将是喜剧演员本·艾尔顿。

sentences.en: She has been deliberately left off the guest list.
sentences.cn: 她被故意排除在嘉宾名单之外。

sentences.en: That would be a reversal of the order of host and guest.
sentences.cn: 这样做就主客颠倒了.

sentences.en: That would be reversal of the order of host and guest.
sentences.cn: 这就主客颠倒了.

sentences.en: The actress was guest of honour (= the most important guest ) at the launch.
sentences.cn: 这位女演员是首发式上的贵宾。

sentences.en: The boy's room is a complete contrast to the guest room.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩的房间和客房截然不同。

sentences.en: The foreign guest has a license on the person.
sentences.cn: 这个外国客人随身携带执照.

sentences.en: The guest is a singer of some note.
sentences.cn: 这位客人是位小有名气的歌唱家.

sentences.en: There was a little cluster of admirers round the guest speaker.
sentences.cn: 有一小群仰慕者围着那位特邀嘉宾.

sentences.en: We have accommodation for 500 guests.
sentences.cn: 我们有可供500位客人住宿的房间。

sentences.en: We have guests staying this weekend.
sentences.cn: 这周末我家有客人来住。

phrases.tran_cn: 特邀发言人，客席讲者；嘉宾演讲人

trans.tran_cn: 客人，旅客，特邀嘉宾，[动]寄生虫
trans.tran_en: someone who is invited to an event or special occasion

trans.tran_cn: 做特邀嘉宾，做客串，做特约演员
